DOC.brief_title: Lymph Node Mapping Patients With Endometrial Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVE : I . To estimate negative predictive value pelvic sentinel lymph node ( SLN ) endometrial cancer predict nodal metastasis . SECONDARY OBJECTIVE : II . To examine ability sentinel lymph node increase detection metastatic disease ultra-sectioning immuno-histochemical ( IHC ) stain compare IHC result standard hematoxylin eosin ( H & E ) result . OUTLINE : Patients undergo sentinel lymph node detection use fluorescence image indocyanine green solution isosulfan blue sentinel lymph node biopsy detection sentinel lymph node note within 30 minute injection dye , follow full pelvic lymph node dissection aortic lymph node dissection indicate , standard hysterectomy salpingo-oophorectomy . After completion study treatment , patient follow every 3 month 2 year , every 6 month 3 year total 5 year accord standard surveillance guideline endometrial cancer .
DOC.criteria: The patient must willing able provide inform consent The patient willing able comply study protocol The patient endometrial cancer schedule robotic hysterectomy lymphadenectomy The patient agree followup examination 5years posttreatment The patient candidate robotic assist hysterectomy lymphadenectomy The patient know suspected allergy iodine , indocyanine green ( ICG ) isosulfan blue ( ISB ) The patient hepatic dysfunction confirm bilirubin > 2 x normal ( base reference value laboratory use patient )
